description: This indulgent sauce is perfect for pouring over ice cream or other dessert. For a more sophisticated chocolate sauce, replace the water with brandy or strong coffee.
keywords: Chocolate sauce,Seafood free,Gluten free,Wheat free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free
name: Chocolate Dessert Sauce Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place all the ingredients along with 2 tbsp water into a small saucepan and heat gently, stirring, for 67 minutes, or until smooth and glossy.
